name: サバイバルメソッド Survival Method
description: A zombie outbreak occurs in a city in Japan. A resident of that town, Nao Fumizuki, finds herself in the middle of this outbreak. How will Nao survive in this zombie-infested nightmare?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1070 VRAM 3GB Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows10 Processor: Intel core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1080 VRAM 4GB Storage: 3 GB available space
